page.title: 10Clubs:-Cub scouts
page.content:
The first thing a cub must learn is the Cub Scout promise.
The Cub Scout Promise _____________________ "I promise to do my best, to do my duty to God and to the Queen, to help other people and to keep the Cub Scout Law." The Cub Scout Law _________________ "A cub Scout always does his best, thinks of others before himself and does a good turn every day. The Uniform _____________ The Uniform is black or grey trousers, grey socks, green round-neck jumper, yellow and green scarf and a green cap. We do a lot of badge work and games and sometimes we go tracking.
